full_summary:
### Dredging Contract in Newfoundland and Labrador

#### Government Tender Announcement - Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Canada, invites qualified contractors to submit quotations for the **Dredging Project at Lawn, NL**. The project scope includes dredging services, as outlined in the respective drawings and specifications.

#### Project Details

* **Contract Reference Number**: CB-942-48180256
* **Solicitation Number**: 30004976-Phase 1
* **Publication Date**: September 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 16, 2023, 14:00:00 (AST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not specified
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) - Competitive, Open Bidding

#### Selection Criteria

* The selection criteria for this project are **Lowest Price**, as per the terms and conditions of the contract.

#### Relevant Agreements and Trade Agreements

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Ministère des Pêches et des Océans
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0E6
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Dina Al-Eryani (Tech. Clerk)
	+ Phone: 506-282-2340
	+ Email: [Dina.Al-Eryani@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Dina.Al-Eryani@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
	+ Fax: Not available

#### Document Attachments
A detailed bid package may be downloaded from the [CanadaBuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21142/30004976--phase-1--rfq_.pdf). Please note that this tender announcement is subject to change. Therefore, please regularly check the [CanadaBuys website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/) for any updates.

---

I operationalized these changes:

*   Simplified the content to focus on essential details.
*   Reformatted the text to enhance readability with clear subheadings and bullet points.
*   Standardized the English-French language for accuracy.
*   Removed unnecessary details, emphasizing only the relevant information.
*   Systematically included crucial contact
